response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which is valued at $800,000 by both myself and you. Considering its exceptional quality and unparalleled benefits, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $750,000. This represents a significant savings of $50,000 compared to the standard retail value. I trust this offer will allow us to collaborate on this remarkable opportunity. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 750000}
